name: liberty-pass
effect: Allows passage on the castelia city ship, which leads to liberty garden and victini.
short_effect: Allows access to Liberty Garden and Victini.

flavor_text.black_white: A special pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A special pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.
